lead_paragraph: Miami received the right-handers Andrew Cashman and Colin Rea in a seven-player deal that will aid in their quest to make the playoffs.

headline.print_headline: Marlins Bolster Rotation for Playoff Push in a Seven-Player Trade With the Padres
headline.main: Marlins Bolster Their Rotation in Trade With the Padres

snippet: Miami received the right-handers Andrew Cashman and Colin Rea in a seven-player deal that will aid in their quest to make the playoffs....
